question: Create a Deployment named 'api-server-deploy' with 1 replicas of the image 'nginx:1.20'.
suggested_answer:
kubectl create deployment api-server-deploy --image=nginx:1.20 --replicas=1

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-server-deploy
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-server-deploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-server-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: api-server-deploy
        image: nginx:1.20
